keys: Economía del hogar. Hoja de trabajo
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82016</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82016</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5011</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Know Your Daily Bread</string>
            <string language="es">Conoce tu pan de todos los días</string>
            <string language="ga">Bí ar an Eolas faoi d’Áran Laethúil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennen Sie Ihr Tägliches Brot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Connaissez Votre Pain Quotidien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saiba Seu Pão Diário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conosca Il Vostro Pane Quotidiano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξέρτε το καθημερινό ψωμί σας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet, with pictures, looking at wheat and the various types of bread that wheat flour is used to produce.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa con imágenes que muestra el trigo y los diversos tipos de pan que se pueden hacer utilizando la harina de trigo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice, le pictiúir, a fhéachann ar chruithneacht agus na cineálacha difriúla aráin a dhéantar le plúr cruithneachta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Home Economics</string>
            <string language="es">Economía del hogar. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Eacnamaíocht Bhaile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Checkliste, mit Abbildungen, Weizen und die 
verschiedenen Typen des Brotes betrachtend, die Weizenmehl benutzt 
wird, um zu produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données, avec des images, regardant le 
blé et les divers types de pain que la farine de blé est employée 
pour produire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet, com retratos, olhando o trigo e os 
vários tipos de pão que a farinha de trigo é usada produzir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda, con le immagini, guardando frumento ed i 
vari tipi di pani che la farina di frumento è usata per produrre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο, με τις εικόνες, εξετάζοντας το 
σίτο και τους διάφορους τύπους ψωμιών ότι το αλεύρι σίτου 
χρησιμοποιείται στα προϊόντα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauswirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Économie ménagère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Economia Home</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Economia domestica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομικά "Οικιαών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
